com.stormpath.sdk.factor.sms

Interface SmsFactor<T extends SmsChallenge>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Auditable, Deletable, Factor<T>, Resource, Saveable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultSmsFactor

    public interface SmsFactor<T extends SmsChallenge>
extends Factor<T>
    An SmsFactor is a Factor that represents a phone used in SMS-based challenge workflows. When issuing a challenge via an SmsFactor, a code is sent via SMS to the phone, and the user can enter the received code back into the system to verify/complete the challenge.
    Since:
    1.1.0
